short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension whitch will automatically clean your browser cache when loading a page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a lightweight tool for disabling browser cache. Users only need to install it to easily turn off the browser's cache function. It is very convenient and easy to use.
